ggsegExtra 1.5
  • Reference

Harvard-Oxford Cortical atlas

Source: R/ho.R
hoCort.Rd

Coordinate data for the parcellations in the Harvard-Oxford cortical atlas.

data(hoCort)

Format

A data.frame with 8203 observations and 10 variables

long

coordinates for the x-axis

lat

coordinates for the y-axis

area

name of network

hemi

name of the hemisphere (left, right)

side

which side to view (medial, lateral)

network

network number (1:7)

label

unique name to each node

atlas

name of the atlas

References

Makris,et al. (2006) Schizophrenia research 83(2-3):155-151 (PubMed)

See also

Other ggseg_atlases: yeo17, yeo7

Examples

data(hoCort)
